contents: Article 25 (Registration Qualifications) ① A person who wishes to work as a leader must meet one of the following qualifications and register as a leader every year. However, the registration qualifications for foreign instructors are separately determined by the member sports organization. 1. Sports instructor certificate issued by the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism 2. Full teacher certificate issued by the Ministry of Education ② Anyone who wishes to work as a referee must register as a referee every year. ③ A person who wishes to work as a player management manager must meet one of the following qualifications and register as a player management manager every year. 1. Doctor, Oriental medicine doctor, nurse under the Medical Service Act 2. Physical therapist under the Act on Medical Technicians, etc. 3. Sports instructor under the National Sports Promotion Act 4. Other qualifications recognized by member sports organizations
